slides.title: Change Management
slides.content:
# Leading Change

## Kotter's 8 Steps

```
1. Create urgency
2. Form coalition
3. Create vision
4. Communicate
5. Empower action
6. Generate wins
7. Build momentum
8. Anchor in culture
```

## Resistance

| Cause | Response |
|-------|----------|
| Fear | Communicate |
| Loss | Support |
| Self-interest | Involve |
| Inertia | Urgency |
